title: "Topline Pro raises $5M for its AI-powered website development platform"
excerpt: "New York-based Topline Pro, incorporated as Dwelling Management Inc., provides a cloud platform that enables small businesses to build websites without writing code. The startup’s platform reportedly uses OpenAI LLC’s GPT-3 artificial intelligence system to automate website development tasks."
